file_content.text: You should get out of here, Cipher.
Cipher--I'm so sorry. Must have been a power surge, probably lightning. You're alright?
Did the whole Citadel go dark? Or just the archives?
Was anything else affected?
Archives, plus a few secondary systems. No harm done.
Don't worry about me.
Good. I had a medic on standby.
I'm fine, but your security system got overenthusiastic. It knows better now.
I had to trash your droids.
I see. I'll alert the Fixers.
We do need to hold you until this is cleared up. Nothing personal, but you were down there unmonitored, and... you know.
I am the Hand of Jadus, and you will not delay my mission.
I don't answer to you.
That's--yes, sir. I understand. You may proceed.
There's no time. The information I found is vital, and I have to reach a contact immediately.
[Lie] There's an emergency.
Keeper said you might need a loose rein. Fine, but we may call you back later. Go.
I understand your position--but there's a war going on, and you need me out there.
Please, this isn't helping.
Besides, you can always contact me later.
I suppose you've earned that much. Get going--I'll have your ship resupplied and refueled.
Don't try to stop me from doing my job. Are we clear?
Bad mistake. [Threaten him]
Clear, sir. But Keeper will hear about this.
One of these days, I swear I'll shoot my way out of here.
We hope you found what you were after. That power surge was poor timing.
They really do need to insulate those generators better. Don't you think?
You wouldn't believe how busy things have been here.
The dispatch from Cipher Four is in. More Republic support on Manaan.
Proceed with the operation. I'll--hold on.
Sir. I thought Lord Jadus had you on the front lines. What brings you to headquarters?
Sir--I thought you'd been assigned to the front lines. What brings you to headquarters?
I have some research I want to do; I was hoping to visit the data archives.
I need access to some files.
Of course. You'll have standard Cipher access. But--I'm afraid I can't clear your associate.
Of course. But you really don't have to come all this way--I can assign analysts to you.
I was hoping to see the Director of Operations.
Is Keeper here?
Keeper's in conference right now. You're welcome to wait, but... I can't let your associate past this point.
Of course. Keeper's in conference right now, but you're welcome to wait. It's good to see you again.
Go back to your terminal, Watcher Three.
That's not your concern.
There is one thing--we've revised security procedures. I can't let your associate past this point.
Big surprise. Come on--I'll lounge on your console while the Cipher works.
We understand. Take your time, Cipher; it's been a while since we heard the song of the city.
Is that how you treat Fixers these days? Or is the system flagging me again?
Do I know you from somewhere?
Attend to your business, Cipher--I'll be just fine.
I'll do that, sir.
Go. They'll be suspicious soon.
Just a moment. Very busy right now.
This is Watcher Three. Cipher Nine, are you down there? We're reading a power failure.
The exit sealed automatically, and droid safeguards are coming online. They'll fire at anything; stay put until we get the backup system up.
He can't see you. Slice the system while you can.
